title: convenience wrapper around .External call — do_read_bib
text: convenience function packages need call internal functionality read.bib different processing. simple wrapper around .External code used read.bib

text: file file name encoding encoding srcfile Deprecated

title: convenience wrapper around .External call — do_read_bib
text: parser greatly inspired bibparse library.

title: bibtex parser — read.bib
text: Parser bibliography databases written bib format.

title: bibtex parser — read.bib
code: read.bib(   file = findBibFile(package),   package = "bibtex",   encoding = "unknown",   header,   footer )

title: bibtex parser — read.bib
text: file bib file parse.  default, file REFERENCES.bib root directory package given package argument used. package package want read bibliography. used file unspecified. Core R packages (base, datasets, graphics, grDevices, methods, stats, stats4, tools utils) treated specially: package contains bibtex entries packages. encoding encoding header DEPRECATED. footer DEPRECATED

title: bibtex parser — read.bib
text: object class "bibentry", similar obtained  bibentry function.

title: bibtex parser — read.bib
text: Nelson H. F. Beebe. bibparse 1.04. 1999. http://www.math.utah.edu/~beebe/

title: bibtex parser — read.bib
code: ## this package has a REFERENCES.bib file bib <- read.bib(package = "bibtex")  ## bibtex collects bibtex entries for R base packages base.bib <- read.bib(package = "base")  # \dontshow{ bib <- read.bib(package = "base") bib <- read.bib(package = "datasets") bib <- read.bib(package = "graphics") bib <- read.bib(package = "grDevices") bib <- read.bib(package = "methods") bib <- read.bib(package = "stats") bib <- read.bib(package = "stats4") bib <- read.bib(package = "tools") bib <- read.bib(package = "utils") # }

what: Generate a Bibtex File from Package Citations — write.bib
title: Generate a Bibtex File from Package Citations — write.bib
text: Generates Bibtex file list packages installed packages. useful adding relevant citations Sweave documents.

title: Generate a Bibtex File from Package Citations — write.bib
code: write.bib(entry, file = "Rpackages.bib", append = FALSE, verbose = TRUE)

title: Generate a Bibtex File from Package Citations — write.bib
text: entry bibentry object character vector package names. NULL, list installed packages used. file output Bibtex file. append logical. TRUE content appended file. verbose logical toggle verbosity.

title: Generate a Bibtex File from Package Citations — write.bib
text: list Bibtex objects -- invisibly.

title: Generate a Bibtex File from Package Citations — write.bib
text: [R] Creating bibtex file installed packages? Achim Zeileis. R-help mailing list.

title: Generate a Bibtex File from Package Citations — write.bib
text: Renaud Gaujoux, based function Rpackages.bib Achim Zeileis (see References).

title: Generate a Bibtex File from Package Citations — write.bib
code: write.bib(c("bibtex", "utils", "tools"), file = "references") #> Converted 3 of 3 package citations to BibTeX #> Writing 3 Bibtex entries ...  #> OK #> Results written to file 'references.bib' bibs <- read.bib("references.bib") write.bib(bibs, "references2.bib") #> Writing 3 Bibtex entries ...  #> OK #> Results written to file 'references2.bib' md5 <- tools::md5sum(c("references.bib", "references2.bib")) md5[1] == md5[2] #> references.bib  #>           TRUE   # \dontshow{ unlink(c("references.bib", "references2.bib")) # }

title: bibtex 0.5.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-01-26

title: bibtex 0.5.1
text: Replaced .personList(authors) .call(c, authors) requested CRAN (PR #52).

title: bibtex 0.5.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-25

title: bibtex 0.5.0
text: underlying parsing logic bibtex files completely rewritten (huge thank Diego Hernangómez (@dieghernan), PR #47)

title: bibtex 0.5.0
text: Unit tests now using testthat version 3 (Diego Hernangómez (@dieghernan), PR #46).

title: bibtex 0.4.3
text: Applied CRAN stabilization patches. (#31, thanks Prof. Brian Ripley!) Removed dependency stringr. (#25, thanks @mllg) ArrangeAuthors() now case insensitive searching -joined list. (#22, thanks @katrinleinweber) findBibFile() now looks inst/REFERENCES.bib addition REFERENCES.bib. (#19, thanks @ms609)

title: bibtex 0.4.3
text: Refreshed README content. (#29). Updated Package Maintainer contributors. (#30)

title: bibtex 0.4.3
text: Switched CI TravisCI GitHub Actions. (#29) Added pkgdown site package. (#29)
